alert.note: Alert for Harvey; Marion; McPherson; Reno; Rice; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 20 at 3:13AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of McPherson, central Reno, northwestern Harvey, southeastern Rice, northwestern Marion and southeastern Saline Counties through 345 AM CDT... At 312 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gypsum to near Inman to near Turon. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hutchinson, Mcpherson, Hesston, Lindsborg, Hillsboro, South Hutchinson, Moundridge, Inman, Buhler, Haven, Nickerson, Burrton, Galva, Canton, Goessel, Arlington, Gypsum, Turon, Partridge and Ramona. This includes Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 40 and 77. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for south central and central Kansas.

area.areaDesc: Harvey; Marion; McPherson; Reno; Rice; Saline
